meanings.definition: A person who delivers milk to customers.
meanings.sent1: The milkman brought fresh milk to our doorstep every morning.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother used to buy milk from the milkman who drove a white truck.
meanings.sent3: The milkman accidentally left a note in the milk carton, making us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The milkman's presence in the neighborhood was like a daily reminder of simplicity and tradition.
meanings.sent5: I can still hear the clinking of glass bottles as the milkman made his rounds.

meanings.definition: A man who works as a milk delivery person.
meanings.sent1: Our friendly milkman always greeted us with a smile when he delivered our milk.
meanings.sent2: The milkman's job requires waking up early to ensure timely deliveries.
meanings.sent3: The milkman's cow-patterned hat never failed to make children giggle.
meanings.sent4: To me, the milkman symbolizes hard work and dedication to a simple job.
meanings.sent5: The milkman's whistle echoed through the quiet streets as he approached each house.
